item.description:
Quatchie sez: it's an uphill plus flats/downhill over fire roads in the park, organized by Eddie O's team of fine folks who do the Cambridge 5K Oktoberfest and Yulefest in Harvard Square, and registration is powered by our friends at RaceMenu.

http://www.vertraceseries.com/

Andy sez:  sign up as TMIRCE. Team costume is 80's theme!

James sez:  but Andy, what about those sweet TMIRCE racing shirts?

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: VERT-SASQUATCH 2.35 mile trail race, Sunday, July 15th
